about.title: About us
about.text: Everything Alpaca was founded in 1998. We design and manufacture premium textiles focused on fine natural fibers, primarily alpaca wool. Our main office and distribution center are located in Los Angeles, United States, while our production center is based in Arequipa, Peru. We serve the American, Canadian, and South American markets.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Our mission is to deliver finished products of exceptional quality and long-lasting durability. We grow alongside our suppliers and artisans while promoting ethical and sustainable production with minimal environmental impact.

footer.description: Luxury Peruvian textiles, crafted with care and consciousness.
